## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### View Documentation

**Markdown:**
```bash
open COMPLETE_DOCUMENTATION.md
# Or use any Markdown viewer
```

**Word Document:**
```bash

# Opens in Microsoft Word or compatible app
```

**PowerPoint:**
```bash
open Proactive_Codebase_Testing_Platform.pptx
# Opens in Microsoft PowerPoint or compatible app
```

**HTML:**
```bash
open Proactive_Codebase_Testing_Platform.html
# Opens in default web browser
```

## ğŸ”„ Regenerating Documentation

To regenerate all documentation formats:

```bash
cd ../..  # Go to project root
python3 scripts/generate_all_docs.py
```

This will update all files in this directory.
